body: These burial wrappings are made of fine, embroidered materials. When a body is placed inside, speaking a command word turns the body to dust. The magic of the shroud is usable only once, after which the wrappings become ordinary, fine cloth.
name: Shroud of Disintegration
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Wondrous Items/Slotless/Slotless Wondrous Items/Shroud of Disintegration
